channel.title: Banning Options
channel.description: Ok, so on my server when you right click on a person you get 4 options well for my owner account and admin account...but when you right click the option **Ban** it just says that their following instead of banning...anyways I can change what happens when I use Ban...becuase if there using like ~>!@ab3ld83 as an account its hard too Ban them by typing in their whole name in bannedusers...without them spamming the hell out of my server
